title: Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace National Historic Site: Social Media
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Social Media              Social Media         Theodore Roosevelt giving a speech during his 1912 presidential campaign.   Stay connected and learn what is happening at Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace NHS. We want to connect with you, and keep you connected to us. Please communicate with us via our social networking sites.     Learn more below.   Twitter Follow @TRBirthplaceNPS on Twitter to learn about special stories and facts, updates, news, and events.   Facebook   Visit Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace NHS on Facebook. Be sure to "like" us! Share your experiences with site staff and other visitors to connect with the broader community of Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace NHS. We post historic and current photos and videos, ask questions, and share stories and news items.   Flickr   Visit the Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace NHS Flickr page to see photos of the museum and special events. Submit your own to share your experiences with other visitors.
